caption.p: Variation in buffelgrass invaded area in Saguaro National Park (SAGU) at the end of 30 timesteps for initialization scenarios exploring sensitivity to amount of susceptible desert (susceptibility) and amount of buffelgrass initially on the landscape (initial conditions), combining levels of susceptibility and initial conditions for 20 Monte Carlo realizations for SAGU both with fire and without fire and with and without varying timing of wet years.
